item.description:
This is a nationwide event at all regional Federal Reserve locations, some of our meetup members will be at the NYC event so I went with that location. Others are listed below, including Boston which has it's own Facebook event page.

Â 

From the Facebook event here: http://www.facebook.com/events/270846059689581/

If you would like to attend this event, and you don't live near any of the Federal Reserve Banks, Rally outside your State government or capital building, Protest a subsidiary bank Go! record it! stream it! send me your information and we will let it be known what localities are showing support for this message!

I've seen cities all over the country rally against the Federal Reserve, and now its time for us as a country to form up, and show these banksters, collectively, that we don't want you anymore! That we reject Fiat currency, we reject the notion that a man or group of men know whats best for the markets, or where to set interest rates. That we reject a monetary policy of elastic currency that can be printed to fund any and all wars, bailouts, and quantitative easing, wall street and all of your lobbyist buddies. At this point in our history, with runaway inflation and the collapse of the dollar looming, we have a choice. We choose to reject these ideas. We have the chance to put on the biggest demonstration against central banking the country has seen since the days of Andrew Jackson. Join us in our fight against these monopoly men and their funny money.

Now that the serious stuff is out of the way, don't forget to have fun! bring signs! Bring friends! bring music! Use your imagination! We are trying to bring a very positive change, and positive information and awareness to our society! So lets celebrate as we progress towards a new paradigm!


Event Listing:

Boston, Massachusetts

https://www.facebook.com/events/263321740434182/
Where/When - 12:00 Noon at Boston Common's Parkman Bandstand
Event Info - We will gather at the Parkman Bandstand (Boston Common) at noon for a couple speakers and then march from Boston Common through Downtown Crossing and Faneuil Hall around 1pm, stopping at each location to reach out to the public with signs, bullhorns, and handouts. We will end our trek at the Federal Reserve at 600 Atlantic Ave to post "eviction signs" on the building.

Contact - Garret Kirkland: garretmk@gmail.com
Carla Mora: cmora_02127@yahoo.com
Michael Heise: BigMikeTheTerror@gmail.com


Washington DC
Where/When - 12:00 Noon at (20th Street and Constitution Avenue, NW Washington, DC 20551)

Event Info - We are rallying in front of the US Treasury at noon on the north side between Bank of America and the US Treasury near the intersection of 15th St NW, NY Ave NW, & Pennsylvania Ave NW. At 1pm we will march 1 mile to the Federal Reserve at 20th St NW & Constitution Ave NW.

Contact - Adam Kokesh: Adam@adamvstheman.com
Michael Heise: BigMikeTheTerror@gmail.com


New York
Where/When - 12:00 Noon at The Federal Reserve Bank of New York (33 Liberty Street New York, NY 10045)
Event Info - TBA
Contact - Danny Panzella: danny@truthsquad.tv
Michael Heise: BigMikeTheTerror@gmail.com


Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
where/when - 12:00 Noon at The Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia (Ten Independence Mall Philadelphia, PA 19106)

Event Info - We Will start to assemble and rally outside of the fed building at 12:00 noon. We will Rally for an our then at 1:00 We will start off our speakers. From there, we will march from the fed, go south on market street, go around city hall, up market street and back to the fed. We will continue to rally untill The afterparty

Contact - Michael Heise: BigMikeTheTerror@gmail.com
Michael Salvi: Mike@mikesalvisworld.com
After Party -

item.name: Nationwide Sept. 22nd End the Fed Event - Let's Coin Together.
